title: Mimi: an evening with Aboriginal Islander Dance Theatre
creator_credit: Reese/Smith Productions, Smith Productions, Andee Reese and Margaret Anne Smith
brief_description: Students from the Aboriginal Islander Dance Theatre perform several of their dance pieces which demonstrate their ability to perform modern dance as well as more traditional dance forms, with, at times, an innovative blending of the two.
